text: You are my today and all of my tomorrows.
Every love story is beautiful, but ours is my favorite.
You stole my heart, but I’ll let you keep it.
I still fall for you every single day.
Forever is not long enough with you.
Your smile is my favorite place.
Love is when the other person’s happiness is more important than yours.
You’re my paradise and I’d happily get lost in you.
I love you more than words can define, feelings can express, and thoughts can imagine.
You’re my favorite notification.
Falling for you was the best decision I ever made.
With you, every moment is magic.
I didn’t believe in forever until I met you.
My favorite place is inside your hug.
I love you endlessly, hopelessly, and unconditionally.
You are the poem I never knew how to write.
Even after all this time, you still give me butterflies.
Being with you feels like home.
I choose you. And I’ll choose you, over and over.
Every time I see you, I fall in love all over again.
My heart beats faster when I hear your name.
You are the missing piece I’ve been looking for.
Holding your hand feels like holding the world.
You are the reason behind my favorite memories.
No matter how much I say I love you, I always love you more than that.
I’d rather spend one lifetime with you than face all the ages alone.
Your voice is my favorite sound.
Every love song reminds me of you.
You are the best part of my every day.
Life makes sense when I’m with you.
